Project

"The Bluestone Sessions"
Acoustic Recording Sessions

2 Artists. 8 Songs. Epic Results.

In 2017, the plan for a one-of-a-kind acoustic session came together like pure magic and featured former Staind frontman Aaron Lewis along with country-folk artist Drake White singing their hearts out in a stone cathedral called The Bluestone. Within the age-old walls of this 115-year-old church, this venue was the perfect place to record intimate sessions with two fo country music’s most expressive artists.

Click Above For Full Session Playlist

What I Worked On

We hired a separate production team for this occasion and I was solely responsible for editing the footage shot during this multi-day recording session. A new task to me, I tackled it head-on with a thirst for learning something new and growing my skillset. Before this, I hadn’t been accustomed to editing live performances, let alone acoustic music.

Today, these are some of the most-watched videos featured on the Country Rebel YouTube channel, have amassed nearly 25 million views, and made well over $110K in revenue for the company. On top of that, it was this session that earned us a Silver YouTube Creator Award for growing beyond 100K subscribers.

Technologies Used

  • Premiere Pro
  • Audition
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
